```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(shinyjs)
library(ggthemes)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(grid)

# Core
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
library(gtools)

# Interactive Visualizations
library(plotly)

# Time Series
library(timetk)

# load custom functions
source('..\\01_scripts\\99_functions.R')
```

```{r}
### fabricate data

set.seed(15) 
lengthOut<-12

busASupplySlope<-20
busBSupplySlope<-50
busCSupplySlope<-60

busA<-makeHist("2018",lengthOut,400,950)
busB<-makeHist("2018",lengthOut,1010,990)
busC<-makeHist("2018",lengthOut,1580,1120)
```

Column {data-height=120}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Business A
```{r}
useShinyjs(rmd = TRUE)

numericInputIcon(
  inputId = "busAGrowth",
  label   = h4("Projected Growth:"),
  value = 50,
  min = -100,
  max = 500,
  icon = icon("percent"))
```

```{r}
### create forecasts based on bus-level data and inputs
busAForecast <- reactive({makeForecast(busA,"2021",lengthOut,input$busAGrowth,busASupplySlope)})
renderPlot({makePlot(busAForecast())})
```

### Gaps
```{r}
gap<-reactive(busAForecast()$forecast[busAForecast()$date==max(busAForecast()$date)]-busAForecast()$forecastSupply[busAForecast()$date==max(busAForecast()$date)])

renderText({ paste("Overall:",gap(),sep=' ') })
```
